00025 SimpleSwitch::SimpleSwitch(const unsigned n_downlink_ports,
00026                 const unsigned n_uplink_ports) :
00027         CsmaChannelNode(n_downlink_ports + n_uplink_ports), nUplinkPorts(
00028                         n_uplink_ports), nDownlinkPorts(n_downlink_ports) {
00029         NS_LOG_INFO("constructing SimpleSwitch");
00030 }

00036 ns3::Ptr<ns3::CsmaNetDevice> SimpleSwitch::getUplinkPort(
00037                 const unsigned i_uplink_port) {
00038         NS_ASSERT(i_uplink_port < nUplinkPorts);
00039         auto p = this->getCsmaNetDevice(this->nDownlinkPorts + i_uplink_port);
00040         return p;
00041 }//getUplinkPort
00042 
00043 ns3::Ptr<ns3::CsmaNetDevice> SimpleSwitch::getDownlinkPort(
00044                 const unsigned i_downlink_port) {
00045         NS_ASSERT(i_downlink_port < nDownlinkPorts);
00046         auto p = this->getCsmaNetDevice(i_downlink_port);
00047         return p;
00048 }//getDownlinkPort
00049 
00050 void SimpleSwitch::setDownlinkDataRate(ns3::DataRateValue data_rate) {
00051         for (unsigned i = 0; i < nDownlinkPorts; ++i) {
00052                 this->setDataRate(data_rate, i);
00053         }
00054 }
00055 
00056 void SimpleSwitch::setDownlinkDelay(ns3::TimeValue delay) {
00057         for (unsigned i = 0; i < nDownlinkPorts; ++i) {
00058                 this->setDelay(delay, i);
00059         }
00060 }
00061 
00062 void SimpleSwitch::setUplinkDataRate(ns3::DataRateValue data_rate) {
00063         for (unsigned i = 0; i < nUplinkPorts; ++i) {
00064                 this->setDataRate(data_rate, nDownlinkPorts + i);
00065         }
00066 }
00067 
00068 void SimpleSwitch::setUplinkDelay(ns3::TimeValue delay) {
00069         for (unsigned i = 0; i < nUplinkPorts; ++i) {
00070                 this->setDelay(delay, nDownlinkPorts + i);
00071         }
00072 }
00073 
00074 void SimpleSwitch::connectUpTo(const unsigned i_uplink_port, ns3::Ptr<
00075                 SimpleSwitch> upstream_switch, const unsigned i_downlink_port) {
00076         this->bring(nDownlinkPorts + i_uplink_port, upstream_switch,
00077                         i_downlink_port);
00078 }//connectUpTo
00079 
00080 void SimpleSwitch::connectDownTo(const unsigned i_downlink_port, ns3::Ptr<
00081                 SimpleSwitch> downstream_switch, const unsigned i_uplink_port) {
00082         this->bring(i_downlink_port, downstream_switch,
00083                         downstream_switch->nDownlinkPorts + i_uplink_port);
00084 }//connectDownTo
00085 
00086 void SimpleSwitch::connectSibling(const unsigned i_uplink_port, ns3::Ptr<
00087                 SimpleSwitch> sibling_switch, const unsigned i_sibling_uplink_port) {
00088         this->bring(nDownlinkPorts + i_uplink_port, sibling_switch,
00089                         sibling_switch->nDownlinkPorts + i_sibling_uplink_port);
00090 }//connectSibling
00091 
00092 void SimpleSwitch::NotifyConstructionCompleted() {
00093         NS_LOG_INFO("bridging all devices");
00094         Base::NotifyConstructionCompleted();
00095         ns3::NetDeviceContainer ndc;
00096         for (unsigned i = 0; i < nUplinkPorts + nDownlinkPorts; ++i) {
00097                 auto ptr_csma_net_device = this->getCsmaNetDevice(i);
00098                 ndc.Add(ptr_csma_net_device);
00099         }
00100         ns3::BridgeHelper bridge_helper;
00101         bridge_helper.Install(this, ndc);
00102         //this->logAllDevices();
00103         for (unsigned i = 0; i < this->GetNDevices(); ++i) {
00104                 NS_LOG_INFO(this->GetDevice(i)->GetTypeId() << ", " << this->GetDevice(i)->GetInstanceTypeId());
00105         }
00106 }
00107 
00108 void SimpleSwitch::DoInitialize() {
00109         NS_LOG_INFO("just calling up");
00110         Base::DoInitialize();
00111 }
